events.title: Summer Music Festival 2024
events.description: Join us for the biggest music festival of the summer! Featuring top artists from around the world, food vendors, and amazing atmosphere.

events.title: Tech Conference 2024
events.description: Annual technology conference featuring keynote speakers, workshops, and networking opportunities with industry leaders.

events.title: Food & Wine Festival
events.description: Experience the finest cuisines and wines from around the world. Meet celebrity chefs and enjoy live cooking demonstrations.

events.title: Comedy Night Special
events.description: An evening of laughter with top comedians from around the country. Food and drinks available for purchase.

events.title: Marathon 2024
events.description: Annual city marathon with different categories for runners of all levels. Includes race kit, medal, and refreshments.
